description:
Life in the UK is a course concerning, not surprisingly, life in the UK. Its is designed to assist you in passing the Life in the UK Test, and leave you on the road to becoming a UK Citizen.

Materials include video file presentations - structured to facilitate ease of understanding for limited English speakers.

The course is structured into 6 sections, each with a comparable official section in the Life in the UK Handbook.

This course will empower you towards passing the Life in the UK Test and leave you on the road to becoming a British Citizen.

Over 2.75 hours content.

Study for the Life in the UK Test in under 3 hours..
title: Life in the UK - Passing The British Citizenship Test
